camtrapdp 0.3.1.9000

Package index

Read and write functions

read_camtrapdp()
Read a Camera Trap Data Package
write_camtrapdp()
Write a Camera Trap Data Package to disk

Accessor (and assignment) functions

contributors() `contributors<-`()
Get or set contributors
deployments() `deployments<-`()
Get or set deployments
events()
Get events
individuals()
Get individuals
locations()
Get locations
media() `media<-`()
Get or set media
observations() `observations<-`()
Get or set observations
taxa()
Get taxa

Filter functions

filter_deployments()
Filter deployments
filter_media()
Filter media
filter_observations()
Filter observations

Transformation functions

merge_camtrapdp()
Merge two Camera Trap Data Packages
round_coordinates()
Round coordinates to generalize camera trap locations
shift_time()
Shift date-times
write_dwc()
Transform a Camera Trap Data Package to a Darwin Core Archive
write_eml()
Transform a Camera Trap Data Package to EML

Miscellaneous functions

print(<camtrapdp>)
Print a Camera Trap Data Package
check_camtrapdp()
Check a Camera Trap Data Package object
version()
Get Camtrap DP version

Sample datasets

example_dataset()
Read the Camtrap DP example dataset
